attributes.review:
WORST APP EVER  
when i downloaded this app i was hit by many explicit images then it dawned on me that the app was targeting children could this be the workings of something bigger, perhaps but i would also like to stress the cult like behavior on this app i was asked to sacrifice my hair in order to feed the DT very peculiar if you ask me. I would not recommend this to anyone 0 stars

This app is horrible. I thought I was getting a reality star, but this app doesn’t even deserve one star. It’s painful to use, and I’m honesty worried about having it on my phone. The first thing is does is ask for your phone number - definitely not hooking up on this app with these people who won’t wear a mask. Get it out of here!

I also notice some unusual klu klux klan memorabilia so this app very unwelcoming to poc and women. I also thing they are selling my information to the Chinese.

attributes.review: I am a long tine trump supporter. I also booked two tickets to his rally latter this year but sadly i was reminded I have to walk my gold fish on that day! I digress, this app is glitchy and supports a man who would get jealous of a rat!

attributes.review: I downloaded the app in hopes of receiving GID powers but instead I ended up with an orange devil in my living room👹, now I don’t have any problem with devils but this one really took a toll on me. Upon it’s arrival it screamed at our fridge for not answering to him when he requested for sparkling water. All I wanted was to play god for a day or two.... very disappointed.
attributes.title: Truly sad and disappointed 🥱
